summary: A set of database migration scripts that transition the backend from version 0.8.0 to 0.9.0, restructuring application variant records, introducing variant revision collections, updating environment configurations, and establishing links between evaluation components and image assets.
business_intent: To preserve existing data while adapting the schema to new features in version 0.9.0, enabling enhanced variant management, revision tracking, environment synchronization, and evaluation integration without service disruption.
